title: Il Mondiale
author: VD
content_html:
WORLD CUP PREDICTIONS

GROUP A
Germany
Ecuador

GROUP B
Sweden
England

GROUP C
Holland
Ivory Coast

GROUP D
Portugal
Mexico

GROUP E
Italy
USA

GROUP F
Brazil
Australia

GROUP G
France
Switzerland

GROUP H
Spain
Ukraine

Group E is the real group of death. The USA could easily upset the fractious Azzurri, Nedved could lead the Czechs over both the USA and Italy, pretty much anything could happen except for Ghana winning the group. Argentina is usually very good, but they are young this year and Ivory Coast is full of quality players playing in the English Premiership. The fact that Eboue and Toure play together in back at Arsenal is a big advantage as most of these teams simply haven’t played together very often.
